Title: S17:E5 - What is AWS and how you become a cloud engineer (Hiroko Nishimura)
Description: In this episode, we talk  about Amazon Web Services, or AWS, with Hiroko Nishimura, AWS Hero, instructor on LinkedIn Learning and egghead.io, and creator of AWS Newbies. Hiroko talks going from IT to cloud computing, creating AWS Newbies, and  some of the major cloud concepts newbies should know about that would make their journey easier when diving into cloud engineering.
